description:
This article was originally featured on The Conversation. Machine learning has pushed the boundaries in several fields, including personalized medicine, self-driving cars and customized advertisements. Research has shown, however, that these systems memorize aspects of the data they were trained with in order to learn patterns, which raises concerns for privacy. In statistics and machine learning, the goal is […]

The post Here’s how machine learning can violate your privacy appeared first on Popular Science.
title: Here’s how machine learning can violate your privacy
